remarks: Set of arrows of the category of non-unital rings (in a universe). (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)  (Revised by AV, 8-Mar-2020.)
statement:
rngcbas.c $e |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) $.
rngcbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
rngcbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngchomfval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
rngchomfval $p |- ( ph -> H = ( RngHomo |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
